Articles.Content:
big news! (i assume the release of 1.0)

[https://mobile.twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/588707536993320962](https://mobile.twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/588707536993320962)

coming sooon! let the speculation begin! 

the Hype trainÃ¢â€žÂ¢ is reaching maximum velocity!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/EkK-DG-MzaM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

-edit-

![CCvXCviUgAE8TqS.png](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CCvXCviUgAE8TqS.png)

 also this probably has a bit to do with it, 11 boosters, is there a 10 image tomorrow?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T22:07:43Z" title="04/16/2015 10:07  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by boxley**
Why doesn't he say that on the forums? Honestly? Although I guess making a countdown thread would be the forum post.
Turning the regulator up, engaging Caboose-Rocket-Boosters.

> 
> Why doesn't he say that on the forums? Honestly? Although I guess making a countdown thread would be the forum post.

There is probably a post on the *Orbiter* forums, tho ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)
Another tweet from Maxmaps - Valentina riding a rocket with 11 boosters... 11 days to go?

> 
> Another tweet from Maxmaps - Valentina riding a rocket with 11 boosters... 11 days to go?

Looks like 11 Mk55 radial engines to me, but that number can't have been accidental.

Release date 11 days from now on April 27?

> 
> Release date 11 days from now on April 27?

If the countdown begins tomorrow it'll release April 28th... which is a Tuesday, which is historically when they do releases! ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Thing are getting...

***HOT*** ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Hype Train? Tch... C'mon guys, this is Kerbal Space Program we are talking about... Not Kerbal Railway Program.

No... we need something greater that fits in with the game... All aboard...

THE HYPE **ROCKET**.

![8bsCIJb.png](http://i.imgur.com/8bsCIJb.png)

Was wondering how long it would take for this to get a thread in the forums. 

I congratulate Boxley for his internship with Squad PR.

I should have thought of this earlier. The release date HAD to be the exact day i have to study the most for the hardest exam i have yet to take. 

(mixed happiness and pain right now)

Hey those boosters look like nothing i have ever seen in stock KSP... Could they be the new SRBs that were mentioned in the last devnotes ?

Well, I guess i'll play a few weeks after the release, when the hotfix will be released ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Maybe it's eleven days till the Media Team releases videos? Squad shouldn't be afraid to hint that.
Engaging SAS,things might get a bit bumpy! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

> 
> Why doesn't he say that on the forums? Honestly? Although I guess making a countdown thread would be the forum post.

Because they don't look at the forums.
The "boosters" look like those side mounted white engines nobody uses. Just retextured. I remember SQUAD talking about things being retextured, so it might be just them but grey.

> 
> The "boosters" look like those side mounted white engines nobody uses. Just retextured. I remember SQUAD talking about things being retextured, so it might be just them but grey.

Not sure about this since they look pretty small... (Valentina Kerman for scale) I would bet on the new SRBs as (i might be wrong) they were said to be .625m parts...

> 
> Not sure about this since they look pretty small... (Valentina Kerman for scale) I would bet on the new SRBs as (i might be wrong) they were said to be .625m parts...

Looks like you're right. But what's it's real life counterpart then?

I for one am done with Maxmaps. I will never again watch another Squadcast with him at the helm. I don't understand why he's allowed to broadcast the little "clues and mysteries" on anything that isn't the KSP Forum. I realize that you mods will probably sanction me for this post, but do what you will. I'm done... SpacedCowboy.

> 
> Looks like you're right. But what's it's real life counterpart then?

GEMs? Scaled down... That's what they should be modeled after. If they're not, then... I'll be disappointed.

Days? Why assume days? Especially since Maxmaps was making puns about "months" all of last week, and Harv left a release\_date.txt file on his desktop that says something about March 2016.

![SmallTrollFace.jpg](http://alpha.renegrade.net/images/SmallTrollFace.jpg)
11 years to go... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Oh boy...they're really doing this aren't they? <breaks out="" the="" rosary=""></breaks>

Well, guess i get 11 or 12 days to screw around with my old SSTOs.

How im gonna miss pre-1.0 turbojets!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/v8FjZ)

And the 20000dV they had, rip the laythe roundtrip capable SSTO Tri-Fighter series......

> 
> Well, guess i get 11 or 12 days to screw around with my old SSTOs.

Just a guess, but wouldn't it be more fitting for a game like KSP to start its countdown at 10?

Damn and just as I started a new career game with the mods that make you have to work to make progress.. 

Oh well I'll mess around with 1.0, but still with 0.9 until the mods I use make it across...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T23:36:12Z" title="04/16/2015 11:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by rockowwc**
  
Cannot Spell
